title: Legends of Runeterra
body: So idk if this was mentioned or not but is this going to be mac friendly ? coz rn it clearly isin't and I'm gonna be disappointed if i miss out on this.

replies.body: Given Riot's design values, I would say it very likely will be, but that Mac support will likely come later, in much the same way as it did for League itself, and how iOS support tends to come later than Android for mobile stuff.
